Detailed Description

template<typename TYPE>
class Omiscid::MutexedSimpleRecycleList< TYPE >

Combination of a simple recyvle list with a mutex.

The mutex is used to lock and unlock the access to the simple list. When the user want to lock an access, he can call Lock and Unlock method.
